greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 5; a(n) = smallest palindromic multiple of a(n-1).
mathematica: a[1] = 5; a[n_] := a[n] = Block[{k = 2}, While[k*a[n - 1] != ToExpression[ StringReverse[ ToString[k*a[n - 1]]]], k++ ]; k*a[n - 1]]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 9}]
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Mar 01 2002
ext: Corrected and extended by _David W. Wilson_ and _Patrick De Geest_, Mar 30 2002
